SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Seems I'm in some sort of building.
A temple or castle, it appears.

SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Well met, Watcher. You have been summoned
unto this land to bear witness to the battle
between us witches and the foul scourge
known as the Calamity. I am the Arch Witch, and on behalf
of all in the Witchdom Pulchra,
I bid you welcome.

SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Ye know of me, then? Even though
this is the first time we've met?

SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.text:
It is by neither volition nor coincidence that
you have come to Pulchra, Watcher; out of all
the countless beings traversing the Conjoined
Worlds, you were chosen for our summons.

SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.text:
I've come searching for my heart.
Does this battle you mentioned
relate to that somehow?

SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.text:
You are the Watcher. It is your solemn duty
to bear witness to our battle against the
Calamity. Upon seeing that duty done,
your heart may perhaps be found.

SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.text: Guess I'll be doing that, then.

SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Indeed, for it is your destiny. Now then,
one of our own awaits outside to serve
as your escort. She will take care of you
from this point forth.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_BLACK.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_BLACK.text:
Oh! I see something on the
surface of the water there.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_BLACK.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_BLACK.text:
Does that mean it would be better
for the witches to meet with ruin?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_YELLO.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_YELLO.text: I see something on the ground.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_WHITE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_WHITE.text: Oh! I see a face on my body!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_WHITE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_WHITE.text: Now that's a proper curious thing!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_RED_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_RED_0.text:
There's the shape of
a face in the flames.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_RED_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_RED_0.text:
Some sort of warning, perhaps?
Aye, I'll need to determine if
this information is accurate.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_BLUE_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_BLUE_.text:
There is a face in the
trunk of that tree.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_BLUE_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_BLUE_.text:
Does this mean the witches
are bad for the world, then?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_ASSASIN_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_ASSASIN_000_CUT_000_00.text:
I was able to read your life signs
this whole time, but I'm still glad
as anything you're safe.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_ASSASIN_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_ASSASIN_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Ah, it appears the Watcher can see through
all manner of tricks. You must know exactly
what I intend to do, then?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_WILLMA_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_WILLMA_000_CUT_000_000.text:
So it's finally time to set out...
Oh, I feel like my heart is going
to beat right out of my chest!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_WILLMA_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_WILLMA_000_CUT_000_020.text: Nae, ye should focus on witching.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_WILLMA_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_WILLMA_000_CUT_000_030.text:
*sigh* Yes, I thought so as well.
Thank you, Watcher.

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_220_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_220_CU.text: Just a little more, I think?

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_250_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_250_CU.text:
Is it really enough for me
to just watch, though?

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_260_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_260_CU.text: The end must be drawing near.

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.text:
Victory now lies beyond the witches' grasp;
aiding them is naught but wasted effort.
Yet you can end all with a thought,
if you but desire it.

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.text:
But I must fulfill my duty
in order to find my heart.

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.text: This is known. You may leave all to me.

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.text:
Wise choice, Watcher. By your will
alone is the fate of the witches set.

SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_AMYA_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_AMYA_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Well, I made my way outside. Now where's
the witch who's to serve as my escort?

SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_AMYA_000_CUT_000_001.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_AMYA_000_CUT_000_001.text:
Well, well! Finally done with, I see.
I didn't want to be near the Arch Witch,
so I was waiting out hereâ€”and I'm frankly
sick to death of all this standing around.

SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_AMYA_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_AMYA_000_CUT_000_010.text:
When did your subsystems get a joke update?
No, the witches are rather frightful creatures,
but you have to stick it out to find your heart. Ah, and look! It seems our 'Watcher'
already has a guest.

SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_AMYA_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_AMYA_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Trust not the witches, Watcher, for they
would use your power only to traverse
the Conjoined Worlds for themselves.
Understood? Trust not the witches.

SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_AMYA_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_AMYA_000_CUT_000_040.text:
I cannae understand ye there, love.
In any event, I must fulfill my
Watcher duties to find my heart.

SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_AMYA_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_AMYA_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Gotta admit, I was expecting the Watcher
to be a bit more...I dunno. Dignified, I guess?
Also kinda surprised to see that you're a machine.

SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_AMYA_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_AMYA_000_CUT_000_070.text:
So sorry for the nature of my form.
That said, would ye mind telling me
a wee bit about this world?

SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_AMYA_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_AMYA_000_CUT_000_080.text:
The Arch Witch didn't explain ANYTHING?
No witches, no Calamity, nothing?
Sheesh, okay. Sure.

SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_AMYA_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_AMYA_000_CUT_000_090.text:
Right then! Intros. So I'm Ameya Aisling,
one of the witches of the white. That's important, because here in the
Witchdom Pulchra, witches are divided
into five separate colors, each one
with their own land.

SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_AMYA_000_CUT_000_170.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_AMYA_000_CUT_000_170.text:
Calamities are a side effect of our magic usage,
which means they like places with lots of power.
So right now, this crystallization is slowly taking
over all of our domains.

SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_AMYA_000_CUT_000_180.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_AMYA_000_CUT_000_180.text:
Could ye not simply stop
using magic, then?

SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_AMYA_000_CUT_000_190.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_AMYA_000_CUT_000_190.text:
That's no different than telling us to stop
being witches, which is a non-starter.
Either we stand against the Calamity,
or we fall and cease to be witches.

SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_AMYA_000_CUT_000_200.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_AMYA_000_CUT_000_200.text:
But it's not all doom and gloom!
Fighting a Calamity is one of those
once-in-a-lifetime things, so we try
to make it a real party. I mean, you know. Break out the big
spells, throw everything we've got into
each battle... Just have fun while we
try not to die, basically! Er, does that make sense?
Any of that getting through?

SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_AMYA_000_CUT_000_220.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_AMYA_000_CUT_000_220.text:
No worries! Anyway, here's where you fit in:
as this generation's Watcher, it's your
sacred duty to oversee our war.

SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_AMYA_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_AMYA_100_CUT_000_040.text:
And what is that supposed to mean?
I cannae make a determination as
to whose information is correct.

SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_AMYA_100_CUT_000_060.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_AMYA_100_CUT_000_060.text:
You're the Watcher, right?
Uh, so why are you standing
there mumbling to yourself?

SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_AMYA_100_CUT_000_090.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_AMYA_100_CUT_000_090.text: They told me not to trust witches.

SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_AMYA_100_CUT_000_100.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_AMYA_100_CUT_000_100.text:
Whaaat!? Okay, who said that?
What'd they look like!?

SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_AMYA_100_CUT_000_110.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_AMYA_100_CUT_000_110.text:
I don't remember anything of particular
note. Er, but who are ye, if I may?

SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_AMYA_100_CUT_000_120.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_AMYA_100_CUT_000_120.text:
Eeep! Sorry about that. I know it
sucks to get bombarded with questions
the moment you show up someplace. Right, so I'm Ameya, a witch of the white,
and I've been told to guide you around.
Nice to meetcha!

SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_AMYA_100_CUT_000_121.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_AMYA_100_CUT_000_121.text:
Hey, if you say so! Anyway, I'm Ameya,
a witch of the white, and I've been
told to guide you. Nice to meetcha!

SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_AMYA_100_CUT_000_130.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_AMYA_100_CUT_000_130.text: Lovely to meet you, dear. I'mâ€”

SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_AMYA_100_CUT_000_140.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_AMYA_100_CUT_000_140.text:
Oh, I know. The Arch Witch already
told me everything about you.

SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_AMYA_100_CUT_000_150.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_AMYA_100_CUT_000_150.text:
So, anything you want to ask up front,
or do you just wanna get to watching?

SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_AMYA_100_CUT_000_170.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_AMYA_100_CUT_000_170.text: Might ye explain a wee bit?

SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_AMYA_100_CUT_000_180.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_DIVA_AMYA_100_CUT_000_180.text:
All righty! So here's the deal:
Pulchra's witches are divided
into five different colors.

SUB_W02_SCAN_DIVA_AMYA_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_SCAN_DIVA_AMYA_000_CUT_000_000.text:
There appear to be a number of places
where danger levels are rising.

SUB_W02_SCAN_DIVA_AMYA_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_SCAN_DIVA_AMYA_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Is that, like, Watcher intuition?
Can we trust it?

SUB_W02_SCAN_DIVA_AMYA_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_SCAN_DIVA_AMYA_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Machines cannae feel intuition, love.
This is the result of my assessment
based on a probability scan.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text: Been a while.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text: Sure has! You doing well, Grete?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text: Can't complain. Who's this?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
She's the Watcher. The Arch Witch
and Mom told me to keep an eye on...
Er, I mean, to show her around.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text: Hello, Grete.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
Um... Actually, let's do this later.
Things are fine here. No worries. Bye.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text: Did I do something wrong, then?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
Oh, don't let it get to you. She's shy,
so it'll take a little time for her
to get used to talking to you.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
Ooh, a Calamity fiend! It's Ameya's
time to shine! Stay back, Watcher!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text: Intercepting the enemy!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text: I'll just watch, then.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
Sorry, Grete! I know this is the battleground
of the black, but I sorta forgot I'm a witch
of the white and just...you know. Acted?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
Oh, that's all rightâ€”I know that's just the
sort of person you are. I'll make sure the
Black Sage doesn't find out, okay?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
If she can speak with ye, why does she not
speak with me? Will this metric shift with
the passage of time, perhaps?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
Oh my gosh, you JUST met her.
Maybe try not to be so eager.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
A stranger has stolen victory on the
battleground of the black. This will
earn me a scolding most fearsome
from the Black Sage.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
Are there conditions for this war beyond
simple victory against the Calamity?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text: Just leave. I don't want you here.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text: Being the Watcher is proper hard.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
Um, yeah? Look, I know the Arch Witch said you
can do whatever you want, but did you SEE her
reaction there? It'd be hard to call what you
did any kind of a good move.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text: The Watcher? More like the halfwit!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
That was the first time Grete
even made eye contact with me.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
Wait, you wanted to talk
to her THAT badly?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
Why have you come to the battleground
of the yellow, Ameya?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
I'm showing the Watcher around.
Arch Witch and Mom's orders.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text: Oh dear. I'm terribly sorry to hear that. You do have perfect timing though, because there's a matter I want to discuss. It appears the Dusk Pinwheel and the Yellow Sage have flown off somewhere.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text: Pinwheels fly here?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
Yeaaah? Why wouldn't they?
Of all our flying pinwheels that's
by far the biggest, though.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
I mean, no idea why it would fly off in
the middle of the Calamity, but I'm sure
you'll sort it out with the Yellow Sage.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text: Sure, assuming they come back.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text: Willma, look! A Calamity fiend!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
I, a proud witch of the yellow,
will handle this!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text: I'll just watch, then.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text: Leave this to me!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
It proved a difficult fight without
the Yellow Sage, but we managed.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text: Seems the pinwheel did a runner again.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text: Argh! I knew it! It's all my fault!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
You said you had something you wanted
to talk about earlier, Willma. What was it?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
Oh, it's nothing. The Dusk Pinwheel is
a problem for witches of the yellow, so I
can't possibly discuss it with a white witch.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
Yeah, I guess that makes sense.
Hang in there, okay!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text: Thanks, Ameya.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
Is one witch not the same as another, then?
These differences in color seem terribly
important to you.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
No, all the colors are equal. That's why
it's good manners to not interfere with
other witchy biz, ya know?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
This is an inefficient approach to war,
but let's just ignore that and go look
for the flying pinwheel.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
Hey, if you wanna look into the pinwheel,
I say go for it!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
This is the first time I've seen someone
other than a witch fight. How interesting.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
Non-witches just can't cut it. *sigh*
I should have seen that coming.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.text:
Well, well. If it isn't the infamous Watcher.
Do you really think this stranger's blood
is fit for joining with us witches, Ameya?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.text:
I know how much that sort of thing interests
you, Red Orchid, but I'm pretty sure that's not
what the Arch Witch meant when she told me
to serve as her escort.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.text: Which means she's probably sneaking a peep at us in her magic mirror as we speakâ€” and I'm sure she'll love it! Ha!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.text:
So sorry, but I'm a machine,
and as such have no blood.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.text:
So you have come to the Witchdom at last,
Watcher. Do enjoy yourself, now.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.text:
Eee hee! Wonderful! Now let yourself
be captivated by a witch of the red!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.text:
O fiends of the Calamity, enjoy both
pleasure and pain from my crimson fires!
Behna ascatella!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.text:
Ye possess ample fighting strength,
so I'm not certain it's even necessary
for me to watch the red witches fight.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.text:
Eh, I wouldn't be so sure. Yes, we fight
with a distinct edge when the Red Orchid
is directly involved in a battle, but she
can't be everywhere at once.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.text:
Fighting the Calamity is all sorts
of complicated, it would seem.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.text:
Hey! What kind of IDIOT goes and steals
someone's limelight like that, huh!? Still, seeing you fight absolutely
did captivate me, so... I want your blood. I want it.
Give it to me!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.text:
The Watcher should maybe stick to watching.
Ugh. Begone. I've no need of your blood.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.text:
This is Lita Caryx, a witch of the blue.
I brought the Watcher with me, Lita!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.text:
Hello there. I'm called Diva,
but right now I'm the Watcher.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.text:
So you're the one who's been going around
working to seduce my dear Ameya, eh?
Who exactly ARE you!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.text: Nae, that's not it at all!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.text:
Cool it, Lita! How goes the fight against
the Calamity on the battlefield of the blue?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.text:
We're still researching the Calamity fiends.
So far, we've learned our wood magic offers
no real advantage against them.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.text:
In that case, you'll have to fight
'em more and gather more intel.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.text:
Exactly. And sorry to jump right into it,
but we've got fiends on the scene.
Make way, Ms. Watcher!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.text: Nae, I'll take it from here!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.text:
Run along to the next place and get
to watching. That's your job, yeah?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.text:
Ameya, can you get her out of here?
She's seriously getting in the way.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_00.text:
Energy levels are spiking
at the Brilliant Tower!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_01.text:
We did it! We've destroyed
all of the crystals!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_01.text:
Oh, I'm just chuffed I was
able to be of some use.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_01.text:
Hold up! It feels like... Hey, yeah!
The five castles have all completed
their barrier spells, which means
we managed to protect the Witchdom!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_02.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_02.text:
I always thought witches were something
we become, but now I see I was wrong.
We've been witches from the start.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_02.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_02.text:
We don't save the worldâ€”we're part of it.
Do you see? We ARE Pulchra.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_02.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_02.text:
The world has been screaming for us to help it,
and I finally heard its cries. WE are to blame
for this! WE brought about the Calamities!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_02.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_02.text:
Fiends are the cries of the Calamity,
and one witch is connected to another
by some force that we can't see.
I...I understand that now.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_00.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_00.text:
The Calamity is ended, Watcher.
Your duty is nearly complete.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_00.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_00.text:
It would appear you possess the power to
choose your own fate; a choice which is
yours by right. Not even we witches have
the ability to intervene in this.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_00.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_00.text:
As for you, Ameya, your duty continues:
I bid you experience the Watcher's choices
by her side. Once you have done this,
I will await you in the Tower of Light.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_00.text:
The Arch Witch knows your choices will affect
the fate of the witches of Pulchra, Watcher.
And I know this is weird to say, but... Well, if you've come to understand anything
about us witches, I just hope you make the
best choice for us. Please.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text: You have arrived, Watcher.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
You watched over the witches as we battled
the Calamity, and in doing so, you have drawn
closer to your heart. Now it is our turn.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
Ameya, your destiny has been decided:
you shall shoulder the burden of the
final battle.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
But am I strong enough for that?
Because if I fail, the Witchdom will...

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
You will have all of the witches of Pulchra
behind youâ€”myself included. Rest easy,
child, for you do not fight alone.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text: I understandâ€”and I'm going to win!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text: I'm cheering for ye, love.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text: Nae, I'll fight in your place.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text: Thanks. Watch over me, okay?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
Sorry, but no. This fight belongs to the
witches, and I can't entrust it to a Watcher.
But thanks all the sameâ€”and know I'll carry
your feelings with me into battle!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
Do you truly intend to do this, Watcher?
This fight holds little meaning for you.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
I cannae do anything else. Also, I don't
think I'll ever be able to find my heart
just by watching events unfold.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
If that is your decision, then so be itâ€”
for even if you lose, Ameya will be there.
Let your mind rest easy and fight.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text: I'll give 'em a proper dust-up!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text: We did it! We won!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text: Ye were incredible, Ameya!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
Thanks, Watcher. I feel like I only
survived because of all the things
I saw and did when I was with you.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text: Nae, it was all your doing.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
Now then, Watcher. The time
has come for your final duty.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
I bequeath unto you this Calamity Shardâ€”
or perhaps it would be better to call it a seed
of the Calamity. Regardless, I would have you
take it away to the Conjoined Worlds.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
Which means I cannae ever
come back to Pulchra.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
That is correct. And though you were here
for but a short time, know that we witches
will never forget you... Now begone!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text: I had a blast, Watcher!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text: Ta, love!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text: Ameya!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
Ameya has been turned to crystal.
Her actions, however, have brought
the witches a great victory this day.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
Now then, Watcher. The time
has come for your final duty.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
I bequeath unto you this Calamity Shardâ€”
or perhaps it would be better to call it a seed
of the Calamity. Regardless, I would have you
take it away to the Conjoined Worlds.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
And I cannae ever come back to
Pulchra so long as I have this?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text: Correct. Now take your leave.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.text:
Oh, but I'm so relieved we
managed to win that!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.text:
So this is the Watcher's true power?
It's... It's incredible!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.text:
Thank you, Watcher. And now, at long last,
we are come to your final duty.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.text: Oh? I thought we had it all sorted.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.text:
I bequeath unto you this Calamity Shardâ€”
or perhaps it would be better to call it a seed
of the Calamity. Regardless, I would have you
take it away to the Conjoined Worlds.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.text:
You have taken the Calamity Shard into you.
As such, you can never be permitted to
set foot in the Witchdom again.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.text:
Ah, so this is a Watcher's duty. I see now.
All right then, loves. I'll go willingly
if it means I can be of aid to all of ye.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.text:
Then make your way from
this world with all speed.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.text:
Wait, Arch Witch! Please! I beg of you,
permit me to leave Pulchra. I want to see
the Watcher's journey through to the end.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.text:
Ah, but this is a beautiful end indeed.
You are a witch, Ameya; your path is yours
to choose. I ask only that you return to us
once you have seen all that you can.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.text: I will, Arch Witchâ€”and thank you.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.text:
Get ready, Watcher, 'cause I'm coming!
And don't bother saying I can't,
because it's TOO late, bucko!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.text:
The Watcher was defeated, but this is goodâ€”
for the battle with the Calamity is one for
witches to fight, and it is only right that
we assume control. Now come, Ameya!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.text:
Nae, my journey in Pulchra
is not yet over! For both myself and Pulchra, ye see, the perfect
ending would be to bring an end to the Calamity
and find my heartâ€”and my probability scans also
support this premise.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.text:
Yes, that would be a fitting end for the battle
between the witches and the Calamity. But while
I'm grateful for your choice, Watcher, whether
or not you can find your heart is up to you.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.text:
It's my turn to watch you now, Watcher.
So good luck...and make sure you win!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.text:
The Calamity's energy level has dropped
below measurable levels. It's over.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.text:
So this is the Watcher's true power?
It's... It's incredible!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.text:
Thanks to you, Watcher, the perfect end you
desired is nearly upon us. And so I entrust
what remains to you: the Calamity Shard.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.text:
However slight, I detect the same energy
signature as that of the Calamity within it.
This must be the Watcher's final duty.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.text:
You have absorbed the Calamity Shard. And though 
I know not what all it means, I understand this much:
you can never again set foot in the Witchdom,
for we must safeguard it from Calamity.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.text: And here is my perfect ending.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
Wait, hold up. This is the Tower of Light.
We can't go in there without permission
from the Arch Witch.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text: Nae, we'll be fine.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
Did the Arch Witch really summon you?
...Eh! Not my problem.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text: Well, I guess we're in here now...

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text: Your duty is not complete, Watcher.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
Where is my heart? Will it truly be found
once I complete my Watcher duty?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
There is no need for you think about that,
for you cannot leave until your duty is
fulfilled. I believe I explained this.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text: What IS the Watcher's duty, then?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: GreyWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
By fulfilling your duty, the gateway to
the Conjoined Worlds will be thrust open.
The Arch Witch indeed spoke true:
this is your final duty.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: GreyWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
Take it and begone from the Witchdomâ€”
and do not look to return.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
Aye, very well. The gate is opened,
and so I will leave this world.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
But before I go, tell me of
your nature, Grey Witch.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: GreyWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
Ask yourself this, Watcher: what color
is formed by the merging of them all? Indeed, it is greyâ€”and I, the Grey Witch,
am the ultimate being, one who carries the
strength of all the colors of the Witchdom. And from this point forward, Pulchra will
assume the hue of the grey, as will all
the witches that abide within.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text: And after that?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: GreyWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text: Once this is done, I will turn all the Conjoined Worlds to greyâ€” all life to grey. Aye, for this is the way the universe ought to beâ€”yourself included, Watcher.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
What would become of my heart
if all became grey, I wonder?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text: I'll sort that when it happens.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text: I've no desire for a heart of grey.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
Your plan will fail, for I don't believe
ye can defeat all the other witches by
yourself. And with that, farewell.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
If ye intend to attack other worlds, I have
to act now and prevent it from happening.
But I cannae do this alone, so will all
of ye lend me your strength?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
You are no longer the Watcher, and must
take your leave from this place at once.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
...And yet, grey magic is powerful indeed.
So before I bid you hence, I will make use
of your strength one last time.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: GreyWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
I feel my power...fading? No... No!
Must I truly wait for the next Calamity!?
The next Watcher!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_910_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_910_CU.text:
I figured you'd do it,
Robot Who Used To Be The Watcher.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_910_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_910_CU.text:
Heavens, I still haven't introduced myself!
My serial number is D05-72314, but I'm more
commonly referred to as Songstress Diva No. 5.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_910_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_910_CU.text:
Howzabout I call you that AFTER
you fulfill your final duty?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_910_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_910_CU.text:
I'll take the Calamity Shard with me,
then. Farewell for now, Ameya!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_910_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_910_CU.text:
Byeee, Diva! I'll see you
again in another world!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
In the name of Grete, witch of the black,
I command you to burst!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
That's AMAZING, Grete! You took out
all of the Calamity fiends at once!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text: That's not quite accurate; it wasn't me that did it, but this grey staff. It's powerfulâ€”so powerfulâ€”and... and I think I'm afraid of it.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Which is why I need you to take it. If I keep it,
it'll eventually start fighting with my own staff,
and that's no good for anyone. A witch only has
room in her heart for one staff, after all.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
You got it, girl! Er, but lemme know
if you ever need it back, 'kay?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
And on that note... Here's a staff, Watcher!
I don't want it to start fighting with my own
staff, 'cause that'd be a mess.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text: I'm happy to carry your goods, love.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Ah, excellent timing. It turns out I actually
need the grey staff backâ€”for without it,
I won't be able to defeat the Calamity.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
But what about your staff, Grete?
Won't they just start fighting?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Yes, which is why I'm going to
throw mine away. The old
thing is weak anyway.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Whaaaaaat!? C'mon! I mean, that staff awakened
you to black magic, right? At least let me take care
of it until the Calamity's done.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Yes, I suppose that
would be all right.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text: Now as for the grey staff...

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
...SERIOUSLY!? Well, okay. I understand,
and I won't say anything to anyone else.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text: What were ye talking about?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Did you not hear me JUST say I wasn't
gonna tell anyone? Butt out!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
Grete said this old castle is where she
first got her hands on the grey staff.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
Have ye never investigated
the place, then?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
This is a place witches must never goâ€”
although hearing that only makes a girl
want to do it all the more! We all used to try and come in here as kidsâ€”
sort of a test of courage, I guess. But the
one time I tried, the door was locked and I
couldn't find another way inside.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
Still, kids do manage to get in from
time to time, and it always turns into
a massive deal. But since I don't remember Grete ever
stirring up a fuss, I guess she only
came here super recently.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
Anyway, I got delayed by a bunch of things
and never ended up getting back this way.
But now that we're here, I really need to
give it a thorough look-around. I mean, Grete's been acting crazy weird.
Did you see how she tossed her staff out?
That is NOT a thing witches do.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
Oh? Well, I suppose that grey staff
did exude an energy something like
that of the Calamity itself.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
If that's your Watcher's intuition talking,
then I'm seriously liking this less and less.
Anyway, let's check out the castle!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text: Aye, let's.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
I couldn'tâ€”but Grete got in,
so there HAS to be a way.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text: I'll give it a go.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text: Let's move.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
There doesn't appear to be
anything unusual inside.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text: Oh, but there is something odd about this mirror!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
Whoa, good eye, Watcher!
That's no ordinary mirror.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Old_Mirror
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text: Just so.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Old_Mirror
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
I have been ever so delighted at the sudden
increase in guests. Now please, make a request
of me. What does your heart desire?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
We heard the witch Grete obtained a
grey staff here. Is this true, then?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Old_Mirror
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
A question, is it? Excellent! Indeed,
one of my duties is to answer any
and all questions asked of me. As for your witch, she made but one request:
a wish for power. Such a simple request
deserved a simple answer, so I provided
her with a staff of great might.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
From who or where was it obtained?
Is there someone here besides ye?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Old_Mirror
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text: The staff came from beyond that gate.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Old_Mirror
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
Alas, you cannot pass through it;
it is a gateway for witches alone.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
What manner of staff is the grey staff?
I can sense it possesses a power unlike
the witches' own magic.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Old_Mirror
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
A fine question! That is a grey staff,
the ultimate staff, hewn from the lifelong
efforts of the Grey Witch. And speaking of
the Grey Witch...

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Old_Woman
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
What are you gossiping about,
young lady!? Show some manners!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text: Are ye the Grey Witch?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Old_Woman
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
Me? A witch? Ha! Oh, there truly are nothing
but idiots like you on the outside! No wonder
they're having trouble with the Calamity. But now that the grey staff has abandoned this
castle, the Calamity will soon be brought to
heelâ€”and on that day, witches of all colors
will bow before the power of the grey!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
I don't know what the power of the grey is,
but I know we don't need it! We can take out
the Calamity just fine on our own, thank you!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Old_Woman
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
In that case, you will never attain the victory
you desire. Not that it matters...because you
will also never leave this castle!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
We learned what we came here for,
so cheers! Now let's go, Ameya.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Old_Woman
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
Was I not clear, you rude contraption!?
You cannot leave this castle!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
Aye, but I see no traps or obstacles
barring our path, so I think we can.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Old_Woman
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
No... The Watcher!? Damnation!
Stop them, you lot!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
I think that lady was just trying to stall
for time. We should hurry back to Grete.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text: Where's Grete?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Black_Witch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text: She went to Castle Black Swanâ€”right after unleashing a magic so powerful it destroyed every Calamity fiend in sight! Oh, but before she took off, she said: 'Now the way to Castle Black Swan is clear.' Er, whatever that means.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
The only way to the castle is through
an underground waterway. Let's go!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text: I hear Grete went to Castle Black Swan?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Black_Witch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Yes, she came through a short while ago.
But you may not pass, for you are not
a witch of the black.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text: Really? Not even if I'm the Watcher?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Black_Witch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
You're the Watcher? Very well, do as you wish.
But know this! The guards of this waterway
care not for your esteemed position, Watcher;
they will attack any who are not of the black.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text: Thank ye for the warning.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text: Let's head to Castle Black Swan.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
The power of the grey is greater than the black;
I learned as much when I wielded this staff.
Now leave the fight with the Calamity to me,
for I can win the day with ease!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
You mustn't surrender yourself to the power
of the grey, Grete, for it is no different
from the Calamity itselfâ€”and using such
a power to best it would be no victory.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Yet black magic is no match for the
Calamity! Indeed, it is useless!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Ye are willing to do anything if it means
defeating the Calamity, in other words.
That's a proper risky position to take.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
C'mon, Grete! Wake up already!
The black staff is your REAL staff!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
We have to reclaim Grete
from the grey staff.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
If you enter into this conflict, Watcher,
that witch will forfeit her life. However, I have mastery of a trick which can
make it so the grey staff is damaged
while the witch is left unharmed.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Can ye truly help Grete without
harming her, though?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Do you truly have the time
to be doubting me?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text: Nae, I don't. Go ahead.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
While the power of the grey staff remains,
Grete, I want you to cast a spell with meâ€”
using your own black staff, of course.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text: Right!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
I can't believe I got to cast a spell
with the Black Sage herself!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
And why not, Grete? For it was I who gave you
that staff in order to awaken the power of
the black that sleeps within you. It is a staff of unhurried power that
matches your own talents within.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
You are the type who makes slow progressâ€”
a trait which gives you the ability to
impact things greatly. I know you wish to proceed at the same speed as
other youthful witches, for that is what it means
to be young. But such feelings created an opening
that invited the power of the grey.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
I should have explained that to you more directly,
but I thought your haste and fretting would lead
to growth as a witch of the black, and so left
you to your own devices. Pray forgive me.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
I...I fear you praise me overmuch, Black Sage.
But I will continue in my own unhurried way
to work hard and hone my skills as a proud
witch of the black.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Looks like we're all good here.
Back to the watching!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text: A moment, Watcher. I believed we had no need of your presence on our battlefield, but see now that I was mistaken; times such as these are exactly when we need your overarching perspective. You have helped me to see this, and I am grateful beyond words.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
I cannae claim to understand, but I'm
chuffed I've been a help to everyone.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text: Thank you, Watcher.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.text:
I cannae believe something
of this size can fly...

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.text:
Well, it's not gonna open its mouth up and
attack you or anything, so you don't have
to worry about that. Anyway, let's go talk
to the Yellow Sage!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.text:
You cannot enter without permission, witch of
the whiteâ€”and what's more, that one there is not
even a witch! Aye, but the pinwheel is in foul
spirits right now. Foul spirits indeed.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.text:
Nae, foul spirits are a human feeling.
They don't apply to buildings and
structures and the like.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.text:
Someone caused the pinwheel's compass to move,
which made it float off this way and that.
That is why it is in foul spiritsâ€”
and why I am, as well.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.text:
Perhaps this is what Willma
was talking about, then.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.text:
Pah! Willma is an apprentice witch, and nothing
moreâ€”she lacks the strength to interfere with
the compass. If it were so simple as all that,
I would have already returned the thing.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.text:
Incredible magical power is required to move
the compassâ€”the kind of power that shortens
one's very life. I can ill afford to expend such power in the
midst of a war with the Calamity, which is
why I cannot manipulate the compass.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.text:
Never! Out of the question! A witch of a
different color can never be permitted
to manipulate our compass!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.text:
Enough of this! The strange one here has
overstayed her welcome, which has caused
the pinwheel's foul mood to descend ever
deeper into brood and bile. How am I going to put this right...?
Ugh. I feel a headache coming on.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.text:
We went to the Dusk Pinwheel and heard
all about the compass situation from the
Yellow Sage. Know anything about that, Willma?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.text:
...It's my fault. I got close to the compass,
and it angered the pinwheel.
Oh, I really AM a golem!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.text:
Whaaat!? Okay, come on! A golem could NEVER
become an apprentice witch! Plus, we've been
friends since we were kids.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.text: But everyone else already passed their Witchterms, and I haven't even been allowed to take mine! ...It's because I'm a golem.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.text:
Would you stop being weird already!?
You have powerful magicâ€”I KNOW you do!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.text: I did have powerful magicâ€”but now everyone else is a full witch, and I'm still an apprentice. My strength in the past was just a golem's strength, and that's why I'm not growing.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.text:
By golem, does she mean a being
created from earth and clay?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.text:
Basically, yeah. They're artificial life-forms made
by witches of the yellow. They can do manual
labor and other basic tasks, though I'm not sure
if they ever made one that looks human.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.text:
I cannae discern whether
she is a golem or not.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.text:
There's no WAY she is. Now let's go
talk to the Yellow Sage, 'cause I bet
she'll know something about all this.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.text:
Aye, it seems a fact that Willma approached
the compass, so perhaps we can glean some
clue to help set it all back to normal.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.text:
Oh, for heaven's sake... What is it now!?
You people can't just keep barging into
the pinwheel whenever you like!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.text:
I want to know why you've never let Willma
take her Witchterms. She and I are the same
age, so she should've been able to take 'em
around the same time as me.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.text:
Tsk! You white witches have such a lack of
discipline. Always running about meddling
in the affairs of other colors.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.text:
Well aware, thanks. But here's the thing:
Willma's so upset about it, she actually
thinks she might be a golem!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.text:
Don't be daft! If we could make golems with
the ability of witches, we'd simply mass-
produce them to fight the Calamity for us! Willma's case is just a matter of timing.
We have to work around to her turn, find a
suitable world for the exam, and so forth.
There's nothing sinister about it.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.text:
Willma claimed the pinwheel got proper
steamed after she approached the compass.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.text: She got a reaction from the compass just by approaching it? I find that hard to believe; she'd have to have either the most perfect or the most terrible affinity with it.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.text:
I want to try one more time to see if the
pinwheel finds me worthyâ€”and if it does,
I want to finally take my Witchterms!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.text:
Not even I can say what will happen if you
approach it again, girlâ€”particularly if your
affinity does turn out to be poor.
You could lose your magicâ€”or even your life. But I imagine you're prepared for that,
so perhaps...

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.text:
Just...just a little more...
Please find me worthy...

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.text:
I can help this child, Watcher...
but I will require your aid.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.text:
Not sure it's right for me to
intervene in this whole mess.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.text:
The Yellow Sage does not wish the girl to
fail; she will pretend not to notice even
if she does catch wind of our scheme.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_050.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_050.text:
Yeah, seems like itâ€”especially since
the Dusk Pinwheel has returned
to its original location.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
If you seek Willma, she is resting within.
And yes, she was successful; I'll schedule
her Witchterms as soon as possible.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
Don't bother. I'm not going to be a witch.
The compass showed me a different path. I'd never even considered doing something else
with my life, but now that I am, it's lifted
a huge weight off my shoulders. So no, I won't be a witch. Instead,
I'm going to visit worlds with the Watcher!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text: Will you bring me with you, Watcher?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text: Aye, let's go together.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text: I cannae do that, love.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
Thank you. And pray forgive me,
Yellow Sage.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
If that is your decision, I must accept it.
However, this is the first time I have ever
heard of a Watcher leaving with a witch.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
It was never my intention to do so.
I'm sorry if I caused trouble.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
The Dusk Pinwheel is returned to its
rightful place, and Willma has forged
for herself a new path. With the pinwheel now o'erflowing with magic,
it is time for me to put the finishing touch
on these events.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
So long as I, the Yellow Sage, stand ready,
I shall never permit the crystals of the
Calamity to take root in our lands! O Dusk Pinwheel! Gather the power of
this land and us witches of the yellow,
and rid us of the Calamity's menace!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
Okay, SERIOUSLY!? What the hell!?
I sounded SO cool and decisive there,
but now you've gone and killed it!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
I would not permit it even if
the Watcher were willing, child.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
Aye, that's what I thought.
Terribly sorry about that.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
The witches of Pulchra have rules, Willma:
you go to another world for your Witchterms,
and determine based on that experience whether
or not you wish to become a full witch. THAT is the meaning of the path the compass
has shown youâ€”it has naught whatsoever to do
with this Watcher.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
...I understand, great sage, and will patiently
await my Witchtermsâ€”but in order to do that,
we must first defeat the Calamity!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
Willma, are you sure about this?
You wanted to be a witch so badly.
Are you SURE it's all right to join
up with this tin can?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
I appreciate the concern, but I'll be fine.
The compass only showed me the path; I'm the
one who decided to take it, and I'm the one
who'll take responsibility.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
I know she says she's good with it, but if
anything happens to her, you're gonna have
the witches of Pulchra to answer to! Oh, and nobody goes anywhere until
AFTER you finish watching over
the Calamity! Got it?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text: Aye, I'll see my duties through first.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
We have to beat the Calamity fastâ€”
for Willma and everyone else! C'mon!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.text:
I suppose the truth always comes out eventually.
I also knew Willma would realize it at some point,
which is why I wanted her to take her Witchterms
as soon as she possibly could. But those other old crones dithered and
delayed, and now we must deal with it
in the middle of a Calamity!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.text:
So Willma was the reason the compass went
out of control? Is she really a golem, then?
Because by all metrics, she seems to be no
different from any other person.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.text:
Did I not tell you before she lacks such
strength? While a golem is essentially a
mass of magical power, such a thing is not
enough to explain the compass's behavior.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.text:
Okay, but if the compass moved on its own,
that PROVES Willma has crazy power, right?
And that's why the windmill keeps flying
aroundâ€”it wants you to get the message!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.text:
...Could it be? Am I the one who doesn't
understand? Am I the one who doesn't
believe in Willma? Am I just the same as
all those other crones? Oh, by the hells!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.text:
I'm so sorry, Willma! I have watched you
grow since the day of your birth, and yet
did not believe you possessed the strength
to overcome your limits as a golem!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.text:
Then please permit me to approach the compass.
If it has deemed me worthy, it should return to
its proper place.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.text:
I suppose it isn't the way of the witch
to worry about worst-case scenarios... Very well, Willma. I will allow it.
Fie, but it is vexing that I was the
one being so fickle about all of this.
I almost cannot bear the thought.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.text:
If you seek Willma, she is resting within;
she stretched her magical power to the limit
in order to maintain her golem body. Oh, but I was so worried watching it.
I thought she might return to the earth.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.text:
Nonetheless, this should force the old crones
into letting her take the Witchterms. For who
are we to judge when she has been found
worthy by the Dusk Pinwheel itself?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.text:
If this is your choice, I will allow it.
You are free, after all.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.text:
Just the type of sound advice
I would expect from you, Watcher.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.text:
Willma, you go to another world for your
Witchterms, and determine based on that
experience whether or not you wish to
become a full-fledged witch. THAT is the meaning of the path the compass
has shown youâ€”it has naught whatsoever to do
with this Watcher.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.text:
I still can't believe you're a golem, but...
Well, look. What I DO know is that you and
me always wanted to become witches together,
so I want you to keep at it.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.text: I do want to be a witch! That hasn't changed. It's just that... Well, I can see a different possibility, and I guess I want to take my chances on it. After all, doing things differently is the witches' way, right?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.text:
Well, no matter where you go or what you do,
you'll always have friends in the Witchdom.
Don't forget that, all right?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.text:
You can take Willma with you once you're
done overseeing the Calamity, Watcher.
Until then, she needs to continue performing
her duties as a witch of the yellow.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.speaker: WhiteWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.text: Psst! Hey, have you heard the gossip?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.text:
Ooo, hot goss? Spill it! Uh, I mean, I'm not sure we
should gossip around...you know?
Watch watch? Hint hint? Nudge nudâ€”

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.text: What are ye talking about, then?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.speaker: WhiteWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.text:
Here's the deal: two witches
of the white are MISSING!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.speaker: WhiteWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.text:
It is! See, when we go into battle, we cast
enchantments that ensure we have a complete
understanding of each other's locations
before we even engage the enemy.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.speaker: WhiteWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.text:
So no matter where a witch goes, we always
know just where she isâ€”even if she gets
turned to crystal!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.text:
Based on that information, there's a
high probability they just did a runner.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.text:
No there isn't! Because if we lose the battle
with the Calamity, witches won't even be able
to BE witches anymore! There's nowhere TO run,
and both of these witches would know that.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.text:
There isn't a witch in the world who wants
to lose to the Calamity. No, I'm sure they
just got wrapped up in something or other. And look, I know your Watcher stuff is
important and all, but I'm gonna try
to find these missing witches.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.text:
Are ye perhaps aware of any place
they might be going, then?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.text:
We'll look, um... Somewhere?
Did you hear anything about
where they were going?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: SquireFake1
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Fine timing, m'lady! We just saw two people who
