looked like the missing witches enter the mine.
We were going to pursue them, but thought we
should let the witches know first.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
That was the right decision: Spirits are
known to appear in this mine, so it would
be super dangerous for you squires to go
poking around. Just wait for us, 'kay?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: SquireFake2
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Of course, m'lady.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Why in the world would those two
have wandered into a mine?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Witches require mines?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Of course! I mean, we can do anything with
enough magic, but having stuff like ore lets
us create things more easilyâ€”and with less
magical powerâ€”than we could otherwise.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Aye, but I don't see either
equipment or laborers here.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
And you won't, either!
Here, I'll show you how it's done.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Oh, there's a good one!
It's perfect for your first time.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Jinks, that was a fiend!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Sure was! We let the fiends dig stuff up,
then we just...y'know! Have 'em share a little.
A totally respectable mining operation, right?
Anyway, here. Have some of what they dropped.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Bit more like stealing than mining,
if I'm being honest.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
You make us sound awful when you put it
like that. But anyway, now you know how
we mine, so we can get back to looking
for the missing witches.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Whoa! Cave-in! You okay!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Ayeâ€”and most importantly,
ye seem to be so as well.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Talk about your bad luck though, huh?
Anyhoo, let's light things up a bit.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Ye used your magic for that, then?
Tell me, what are the principles
underpinning such magic?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
That's a good questionâ€”but explaining
it to a machine is actually going to be
suuuper complicated, so let's not.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Hello? Anyone there!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Help has arrived!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Here they are!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
We felt a rumbling from the direction of the mine
and came to investigate. We thought it strange
that there were two squires at the entrance,
so we went deeper and voila! Here you are.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Goodness! You're the Watcher, aren't you?
Oh, but this is just our lucky day!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
So the two of ye also came here
in search of the missing witches?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Missing witches...? Ah, I see. Those
squires must be spreading the rumors.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Well, as you can clearly see,
we're not missing.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Ye are witches, then?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
It certainly seems that wayâ€”though I don't
have the faintest idea why they're telling
everyone we've gone missing. Perhaps those
squires just have it out for you, Watcher.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Ha! I can't wait to see the look on their
faces when they learn the subjects of their
little rumorfest showed up to help you!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
And with that, we're going after them.
Be well, you two!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Cheers!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
We went in to save them, but ended up
GETTING saved. Man, I really panicked
there for a bit, huh? Guess I was just
worried they might really have run off.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Sorry, love, but I'm afraid all of this
is a wee bit beyond my understanding.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Psst! Hey, have you heard the gossip?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
If you mean the one about how two 'missing'
witches ended up rescuing the Watcher's
party from a cave-in, then we heard it. 
Also, not gossip. Super real. Source: me.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
I hear they were even praised for their
actions by the White Sage herself!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Sounds about right. Meanwhile, I almost
got the Watcher KILLED! Mom's gonna let
me have it for sure. Ugh.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Aw, cheer up! Gloom isn't like you.
That said, we need to catch those
two suspicious squires on the double.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Oh no! This time I'M gonna be the one
to catch 'em and totally redeem myself!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: I'll assist ye.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Impeccable timing, Watcher. We just chased
those two squires into the greenhouse,
and you were here to see it all.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Leave catching those two to me.
We actually talked to 'em last time,
so I'll know if it's them or not.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Yes, I suppose even a lowly squire can't
be taken into custody without evidence.
Go onâ€”one of us will be right behind you.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
The exterior appearance and the interior
area of the structure are not consistent
with one another!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
We'll get lost if we aren't careful;
I don't even know how big this place is.
Oh, and don't let your guard down,
or you'll totally end up as plant food.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Best find them before they get eatenâ€”
and before we do, as well!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
I'll start searching here, Watcher.
Why don't you head in that direction?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
I saw the squires over there!
After them, Watcher!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: There.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Right!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Maybe this way?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Ach! We've run into danger!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: There's no end to them!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Are you all right, Watcher!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Aye, but what of the squires?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Unfortunately, the squires were supper.
All that's left is their armor.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Mmm, I see.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Aye, that's their armor, all right.
Such a shame we weren't able to
apprehend the wee fellows.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Well, that's a bummer. Now we'll never
know what they were after you for.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Aye, unless we ask them.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
What, like with necromancy? No!
That's one of Pulchra's forbidden
schools of magic!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Nae, ye mistake me. I've searched my database
and located the perfect strategy, so we should
go speak with the White Sage.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
You want me to ask MOM for help!?
Also, help with what?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Please just come with me, love.
I need your assistance here.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
The Watcher would like to do some mining, and
wants all of you to accompany her. She would
also like to give you the fruits of this labor
as thanks for the times you have aided her.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
I ask that you accept her proposal for two
reasons. First, it is a kind offer, and you
have most definitely earned her thanks.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: But also, I wish to observe her, for I can't help but wonder why she wants to mine for ore in the midst of the Calamity. Please report back if you learn anything suspicious.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Of course.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: With pleasure.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Well? How was that? As you see,
I told the truth, even if it
was not the entirety of it. That said, I admit to harboring some doubts
about you, Watcher, because you are most
certainly hiding something. Is there some
reason you're being targeted?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: A mysterious voice speaks to me.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Nae, I hide nothing.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
A voice told me not to
trust the witches.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
I don't know anything beyond that, though.
Do you think that could be the reason
I'm being targeted?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
I appreciate your honesty, and may have an
inkling who this mysterious voice belongs to.
Regardless, it seems you are VERY important
to them, Watcher.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Now please make your way to the mines.
They will grow suspicious if you're late.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
What are you scheming here,
Grey Witch...?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Cheers for agreeing to assist me today!
As I possess no mining functionality,
your help will be invaluable.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: We'll dig up lots of good stuff!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Oh, but I've heard there are ghosts
in this mine. Is that true, then?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
There have been occasions in which a spirit
attracts a ghostâ€”it's truly terrifying.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Agreed. Ghosts are the WORST.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Aye, and I hear it's best to take the
hand of someone when you're afraid.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Thanks!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: It's a little dark.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: It doesn't get any brighter.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: SquireFake1
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Why... Why did you kill...?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: EEEK! S-S-SQUIRE GHOST!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: But... But how is this possible?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: B-b-b-but...

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: SquireFake1
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Melting... I'm melting...
My body is melting away...

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Nooo! I'm sorry, Mr. Ghost!
Please forgive me!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Okay, now this is just getting annoying.
Enough tricks, spirit! Why are you showing
us some imaginary squire ghost!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: SquireFake1
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Don't run... Take me with you...
Take my hand...

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Eeek! No, don't hold my hand!
Wait, you CAN'T hold my hand!
I'm YOU! You're ME! Noooooo!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: SquireFake1
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: I'm thinking that's enough?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Cheers for that, Ameya. I don't possess
acting functionality, so your help was
most invaluable.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
You knew there were no squires
from the very beginning?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Aye, my readings of all their
metrics were unchanging, so I
knew they were the same people.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
So what now? Will you reveal our scheme
and hand us over to the White Sage?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Nae, that's not my role.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
I have a question, though: Have ye
ever heard a voice telling ye
not to trust witches?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Uh, no? I mean, what kind of idiot would
tell a witch not to trust a witch?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Aye, I suppose that's true.
Sorry for detaining you. Ta!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
I can't believe the two of them actually
thought that would work! Man, maybe
I'm not that good at judging people...

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
I cannae find the words to
respond to that. So sorry.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Is this person also a witch, then?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Pulchra is populated by both witches and the
squires who serve them. This guy's a squire,
so he serves witches. Make sense?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
It saddens me to hear the two of you speak so
indifferently toward a beleaguered squire such
as I, for is it not a rule of this world that we
should offer words of support to social lessers?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Oh, so sorry, love!
Is something wrong?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
How very kind of you to ask! You see, m'lady,
I am a squire who uses a particular set of
skills in service to witches of the red. Alas, I have recently been given commands by both
the honorable Red Sage and her glorious elder
sister, the Red Orchid, and now find myself at
a loss over whose order I should prioritize.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Hierarchically, I should put the Red Sage above
all others. The Red Orchid, however, has always
held my skill in high esteem, and I should like
to prove she is not mistaken in that evaluation.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: And what have they asked of you?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
The Red Sage has commanded me to assassinate
the Red Orchid. The Red Orchid, conversely,
has baded me assassinate the Red Sage. I believe the term for my skills would be
'wetwork' in some circles? But to put a
finer point on it, I am an assassin.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
I beg you, m'lady! Help me solve this
most vexatious of workplace conundrums!
Whose order should I carry out?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Ye shouldn't kill either of them.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Ye should kill them both.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Those two are ALWAYS fighting about
one thing or another, so just ignore it. I mean, just because you're a squire doesn't
mean you need to take every word they say
seriouslyâ€”especially when they're trying to
put hits out on each other!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
I'll go get them to make upâ€”and since
I think this qualifies as 'watching,'
you can come, too.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
...Ignore a witch's command?
I've never considered such a thing!
Could I truly get away with it?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
...Indeed, it is only by carrying out both
sets of orders that I can honor all the tasks
entrusted to me. That seems the best way
I can fulfill my duties in their entirety!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Do these sisters quarrel so much
that an assassination attempt
is not a surprising thing?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
The Red Sage is the Red Orchid's little sisterâ€”
and the Red Orchid is one of the most powerful
witches in all Pulchra. But here's the thing: nobody knows how the
Red Orchid feels about being passed over
for sage in favor of her little sister.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Also, the people around them are constantly
running off on some random whim or another,
which doesn't help matters.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
What errand brings you here, Watcher?
I hardly need you to look after me.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
We heard ye and your sister are
trying to have each other killed.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
So the Red Orchid put out her own order,
did she? I always knew we were alike
in some rather strange ways. However, your concern is unwarranted,
because I do not fear assassination.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Ah, then my intrusion was
unnecessary. So sorry.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
AAANYWAY, we need the two of you to make up.
If there's anything we can do to help that along,
we'll do itâ€”'cause this is no time for two of our
best witches to be fighting!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
I know how foolish this all must seem to you,
given the times we now find ourselves in.
But in truth, the course of events often
hinges upon such things as this.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
There is something in the Scorching Tower
that hails from our memories; I wonder if
my sister recalls it? The answer to that question could cause us
to lay down our armsâ€”or more specifically,
to point them at the Calamity instead
of one another.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Tower, memories, got it. We'll swing by
the Red Orchid's place and let her know.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
What errand brings you to
this battlefield?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
There's something from your memories in the
Scorching Towerâ€”something you share with
your sister. Do you remember what it is?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Do you take me for a fool?
I'm not so absent-minded as
to forget something like that! But also, this is none of your business.
I understand her feelings and what she's
attempting to do, and that is enough.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
So I can assume you two are gonna
make up and NOT kill each other?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
You can. I will set off for
the Flame Fortress at once.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
After reflecting on things, I realize
ordering your assassination was...
Well, let's call it overkill.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
I feel exactly the same, Sister.
Also, I can't believe you remembered it.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Yes, and I'll never forget it.
Not for the rest of my life.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: A drink for m'ladies, if it please?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
You? Bringing us tea? Oh ho ho!
Sister, this tea is clearly poisoned.
I advise you to drink it with care.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Worry not, sister of mine: I've cast an
enchantment on myself that detoxifies
everything that I consume.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: GYAAA!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
The slimy cur put a poisoned needle
on the CUP instead of in the drink!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Just so, Red Orchid! The tea was a mere
distraction so you might lower your
guard regarding the cup itself. At last, I have done it! Not even
the great Red Orchid was able to
see through my deception!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Sister...

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: I'm sorry...Zhu Ya...

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
I have done it! I carried out both
sets of orders at the same time!
What a great success!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
THEY JUST MADE UP, YOU CHOWDERHEAD!
WHAT THE HECK ARE YOU DOING!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Wait, really? Oh. Oh no.
What HAVE I done!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Do ye have an antidote?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Errr... No. But I can make one,
provided I have a scale from
the Salamander!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Sounds like we're headed to
the Scorching Tower! C'mon!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: There's the assassin!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Get in the tower! Quick!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
We've not got much time!
Just tell me what ye need.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
If m'lady would be so good as to draw the
Salamander's attention? While you do,
I'll pick up a scale once it falls off.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
We're not going to just
tear a scale off of it?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Well, that's a simply ridiculous idea.
Now go on with you!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Do you require anything else?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
This will do for nowâ€”although it
may prove rather difficult to drink.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Let's hurry back, then.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Zhu Ya!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
I'm all right, Sisterâ€”although slightly
vexed we had to be saved by the Watcher.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
An utter disgrace, to be certain.
Now where is that squire!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
I am here, m'ladies, and will accept
any punishment you deem fit.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
As we hold some blame here, perhaps we can all
just agree to be more careful in the future.
In the meantime, continue honing your skills so
you might do more good for us witches of the red.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: It would be my pleasure, m'lady.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Well then, Sister? Let us use the power of
the Salamander that rests within us to
cooperate and incinerate the Calamity
crystals which blanket our lands.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Quite so. We will begin at once.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Looks like it all worked out.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: I'm chuffed everyone is all right.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Guess we're back to watching, then!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
One of the Red Sage's little riddles, is it?
Well, perhaps I will pose one of my own:
the both of us went to retrieve a thing,
but ended up leaving a thing behind.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
I'm sure you can puzzle this one out, Watcher.
Once you know both what we went to get
and what was left behind, return here to me,
and I will make peace with my sister.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Riddle time, Watcher!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Well? Did you solve the riddle?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
I won't know until I go inside and take
a peek. What sort of place is this tower?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Oh, pretty much what it looks like!
There's a fire spirit called the
Salamander in there.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Perhaps the riddle has to do
with this fire spirit, then.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Oh, look! Fireproof gloves.
Two, in factâ€”one from each pair.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Guess they definitely came here to get
a scale from the Salamander, huh?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
I'll draw the creature's attention.
Ye collect the gloves and scale.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Smart thinking. You got it!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
That went great! Er, but I don't get why they
left the gloves here. I mean, how did they
plan to get the scale back without 'em?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Be that as it may, m'lady, I received no
countermanding orders. And as you know,
I am a squire, and the commands I receive
from witches are absolute. And with that, my duty is done.
Farewell to you both!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: No, wait!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
He may have an antidote.
We'd best go after him.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
That makes it sound like squires
are the witches' property.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
So what, you're on the
assassin's side now?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Not what I meant to imply, love.
Terribly sorry about that.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Well, well! The two of you clearly want an
antidote! Yet, did it ever occur to youâ€”even
for a momentâ€”that I might not have one?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Nae, I calculate a greater than
zero chance you possess it.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
If there's one thing I loathe,
it's undeserved confidence.
That's enough of you, Watcher!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
...Here. The antidote. It's made from a
scale of the Salamander, and should
revive flames that have been lost.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
I suppose ye never intended
to kill them at all, then?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Tell that to the two witches who gave
my ordersâ€”orders that are absolute.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
But as I have managed to fulfill both
sets of orders, I now answer to no oneâ€”
and I will never relinquish this newfound
freedom! Never, I say! Huzzah!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Oh no! He jumped!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Aye, but we have the antidote.
Now let's be off.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: ...Er, right.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
I don't understand what that poor fellow
was saying about gaining his freedom.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
It saddens me to think I let such a brilliant
squire die in vainâ€”and I swear here and now,
I will never permit such a thing again.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Well, I guess it worked out...okay?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
It's a relief the sisters
are safe, at least.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
What's Mother doing under the tree?
Oh, I don't like this at all...

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: Mother!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: Are you all right!? Say something!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
The crystallization has
found its way here...

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: Nnngh...

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: Ach! A fiend!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
This is Lita's familiar, Pierre.
What are you doing here, Pierre!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Pierre
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
!?
!
RIBBIT!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
Oh, but you're quite
skilled at dancing.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: Ribbit.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: BlueWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: Croak croak.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: Ribbit! Ribbit!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: BlueWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: Croak croak croak.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
I think this wee fellow wants to say
something, but I'm not equipped with
the functionality to interpret for it.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: If Lita were here, she'd definitely know what Pierre is trying to say.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: Oh! Wait!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
We're heading under the Tree of the Forever Young,
to the place where its roots extend.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
Wait, I can't go? Oh, c'mon!
SHE gets to go, but I can't!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: I'll just have a peek around, then.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: Pieeerre! Whyyy!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: What are ye looking for?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
Ach! Crystallization from the Calamity!
Ye were trying to warn us about this!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: I'll destroy it straightaway.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: Oh dear! It came back!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
The crystals are dug into the tree's roots.
If we don't solve this problem at its heart,
it will sap the power of the castle and use
it to keep regenerating.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
I could destroy the crystallization by killing
the roots, but there's no telling what would
happen to the castle if I did that. Oh man,
what the heck are we supposed to dooo!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: You got an idea, Pierre!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: Hey! Where you going!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: After him!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
Oh! He wants to use the
poison spring in the Bluewood!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
Aye, but is poison really a good idea?
Won't it spread to the castle?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
Well, it'd mess their stomachs up good if
witches or animals drank it, but since the
plants around here seem fine, I thiiink
the castle should be okay? But...

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
I wonder if the poison will
work on the crystals, though.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
Well yeah, that's the thing. I mean,
Pierre seems pretty convinced, but a
familiar's just a familiar, ya know?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: Hey, it's Lita! LITA!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
Pierre, look! It's Lita! Er...but what
the heck is she doing? And how come
she doesn't seem to notice us?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
She's drinking from the spring.
Is it not dangerous for living
creatures to do so?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: Ribbit.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
Hang on... Hang ON! Oh my gosh,
have the two of them swapped BODIES!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
Okay, so something weird happened beneath
the castle and the two of you ended up
swapping bodiesâ€”which explains why you
refused to let me go underground! Aw, thanks so much, Lita! If it wasn't
for you, I'd be a cat right now!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
Is it okay to drink so much
poison spring water, Pierre?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
In that case, we should hurry back
to the castle and destroy the crystal.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
First, we soak the roots with
the poison spring water.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
The crystals have changed color.
I think the poison's working!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: Now to destroy them.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: Ach! Fiends!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: Ribbit!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: We have to defeat the fiends!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: Right then, here we go.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: Ribbit.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: Pierre!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
Oh, Pierre! You protected my body!
You knew all of this would happen
and switched in order to protect me!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: BlueWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
The Tree of the Forever Young has been revived.
Let us wield its youthful vitality to rid ourselves
of these crystals.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: Is Pierre all right?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: Have a look!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Pierre
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: RIBBIT!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_000.text:
Same as the castle:
they turn to crystal.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_000.text:
But we won't give up because we lost one
castle, so please keep watching over us.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_010.text:
We lost another castle to crystallization?
Damn it! I knew a battle with the Calamity
would be hard, but THIS hard...?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_010.text:
No, Ameya! Don't give in to despair!
There's still hope!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_010.text: Aye, and I can keep going, too.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_020.text:
A third castle, gone! We're gonna
lose to the Calamity at this rate!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_020.text:
I'll never find my heart if the witches
lose to the Calamity. What to do...?

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_030.text:
We lost a fourth castle. There's only
one left, so we have to protect it!

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_030.text: I'll give ye all my strength.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_040.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_040.text:
It's over... Every castle that protects
Pulchra has been consumed by crystal...

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_RETURN_100_CUT_00.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_RETURN_100_CUT_00.text:
Thus ends Pulchra, the world of witches.
A complicated feeling, this: at once sad,
but also something of a relief. Well, there's little purpose
in our dithering around here
any longer, so let's be off.

SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_RETURN_100_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_EVAR_DIVA_AMYA_RETURN_100_CUT_00.text:
Shame I wasn't able to find
my heart in the end, though.

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
Is there a specific route the
Watcher must follow, then?

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
The Arch Witch said you could go anywhere
you likeâ€”apparently things will happen
just by your being there.

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
I wasn't aware I possessed
any such functionality.

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
Honestly, it makes me wonder
what Watchers are even FOR.

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
It seems as though things will
change even in the places the
Watcher does not travel to.

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
Though all witches are fighting for our lives,
we don't fully understand the Calamity's power.
We just know we have to drive it backâ€”
and that we're not going to lose!

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
If I can be of use,
I'll do my best to help.

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
I appreciate the sentiment,
but this is a fight for us witches.

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
What is the Arch Witch doing while the
other witches engage in battle, then?

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
She keeps vigil in the Tower of Light,
ensuring that the balance of spirit
energy is maintained.

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
Aye, I do indeed sense an
incredible energy at that tower.

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
Mana gathers there from throughout the
Conjoined Worldsâ€”that power is the only
reason witches even exist.

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
And she shares that mana
with the rest of ye?

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text: Well, it's a little different than that. ...Actually, a lot different. ...Actually, completely different. But hey, you're the Watcher, not a witch. You don't really need to get it.

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
The world seems unaffected when 
the witches lose their bases.

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
Thankfully, the Arch Witch is in the
Tower of Light trying to minimize the
impact of that kind of thingâ€”and her
power is SUPER impressive.

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
Does the Arch Witch rule over
all the other witches, then?

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
Uh, that's not... No. You make it sound
like some sort of master-servant thing,
but it's not like that at all. Also, we're not fighting this battle because
she's ordering us to. Battling the Calamity
is just a thing witches do.

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text: Ah, I see. More nuanced, then.

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
So if all the crystals are destroyed,
the witches will have won. But if the
world is swallowed up with crystal,
the Calamity will have won?

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
Yup! But don't forget that witches have the
power to turn the tide in a single moment.
So long as we have even the slightest chance,
we can totally win this thing.

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text: Do ye have proof of that?

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text: No, just a witch's conviction.

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
Just head off to wherever strikes
your fancy! Can't be in multiple
places at the same time, after all.

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
Could you not use your skills
to make copies of me?

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
You're thinking of a ninja, buddy.
We're WITCHES.

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
What is Pulchra like when the war
with the Calamity is not going on?

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
Pulchra's... Well, it's Pulchra. I think it
might be hard for you to come back and see
it like that, though; it's not very easy
to get into this world, after all.

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
But hey, that's why you're
the chosen one!

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
So the role of the Watcher is not
simply to watch over the fight
with the Calamity, then?

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
I guess the Calamity woke something in us.
Stuff that wouldn't normally happen is...
Well, it's happening.

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text: My days, what will happen next?

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
I know being the Watcher can make it feel like
you're just standing around watching stuff,
but this is serious business, so don't let the
other witches hear you talking like that.

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
The battle has gone on
for some time now.

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
Yeah, and I think the witches might be wearing
out a littleâ€”but we can't whine or complain!
I mean, the enemy's a bunch of crystal, so it
won't be griping anytime soon, you know?

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
Aye, fighting a long war isn't
particularly advantageous for ye.

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
Exactly. Wish I could snap my fingers
and have it done with, but maybe
that's just my personal preference.

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.text:
Why do you continue
your vigil, Watcher?

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.text:
Ah, but you have been deceived.
The Arch Witch's words are a curse,
one that has bound your very soul
to the task.

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.text: Well, even if that is true, I will continue my watchâ€”for I cannae determine if your words are the truth, and I have no other clues as to where I might find my heart.

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.text: Got pretty quiet there. You okay?

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.text:
I was thinking about the
duty of a Watcher.

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.text:
I think you're a little too serious.
Er, but don't get me wrong!
As a witch, I'm grateful.

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.text:
I do not hate all the witches.
On the contrary, one could say
I love each of them individually.

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.text:
The Arch Witch and sages, however, are a
different tale, for they are corrupt beings
that are neither great nor wise.

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.text:
Without your strength, they would have
no chance of saving Pulchra. Therefore,
there is no value in aiding them.

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.text: What would ye have me do, then?

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.text:
It's simple. I will make it so you might
accomplish your goal instantly.

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.text:
Constantine was clear:
I must find my heart on my own.

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.text: Sorry, what's this about your heart?

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_9.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_9.text:
How long is the battle
going to last, then?

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_9.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_9.text:
We're close now. I can feel
the Calamity's power waning.

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_9.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_9.text: This war is a long one.

SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_9.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_DIVA_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_9.text: Victory is comingâ€”I'm certain of it.
